RestConnector.Title: Balance History
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns a list of transactions that have contributed to the Stripe account balance

RestConnector.Title: Customers
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns a list of your customers.

Text.Title: Filter by email
Text.HelpText: A filter on the list based on the customer’s email field

RestConnector.Title: Charges
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns a list of charges you’ve previously created

RestConnector.Title: Disputes
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns a list of your disputes.

RestConnector.Title: Events
RestConnector.HelpText: List events, going back up to 30 days.

RestConnector.Title: Payouts
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns a list of existing payouts sent to third-party bank accounts or that Stripe has sent you.

RestConnector.Title: Products
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns a list of your products.

RestConnector.Title: Refunds
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns a list of all refunds you’ve previously created.

RestConnector.Title: Customer Bank Accounts
RestConnector.HelpText: A list of the bank accounts belonging to a Customer.

RestConnector.Title: Coupons
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns a list of your coupons.

RestConnector.Title: Invoices
RestConnector.HelpText: List all invoices, or list the invoices for a specific customer.

RestConnector.Title: Invoice Items
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns a list of your invoice items.

RestConnector.Title: Plans
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns a list of your plans

Text.Title: Filter by product
Text.HelpText: Only products of type 'service' can be used

RestConnector.Title: Subscriptions
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns a list of subscriptions

Fetch.Fetch.Url: https://api.stripe.com/v1/subscriptions? limit=@(Model.PageCursor.NextTake) @(Model.PageCursor.Page != 0 ? "&starting_after=" + Model.NextPageToken : "") @(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Model.Customer) ? "&product=" + Model.Customer : "") @(!string.IsNullOrEmpty(Model.Plan) ? "&product=" + Model.Plan : "") @(Model.Status != "default" ? "&status=" + Model.Status : "")

RestConnector.Title: Subscription Items
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns a list of your subscription items for a given subscription.

RestConnector.Title: Account Details
RestConnector.HelpText: Retrieves the details of the account.

JsonPath.Title: Legal Entity Business Tax Id Provided
Legal Entity Personal Address Postal Code
Legal Entity Personal Id Number Provided

RestConnector.Title: Connected Accounts
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns a list of accounts connected to your platform via Connect. If you’re not a platform, the list is empty.

JsonPath.Title: Legal Entity Business Tax Id Provided
Legal Entity Personal Address Postal Code
Legal Entity Personal Id Number Provided

RestConnector.Title: Application Fees
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns a list of application fees you’ve previously collected.

RestConnector.Title: Transfers
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns a list of existing transfers sent to connected accounts.

RestConnector.Title: Transfer Reversals
RestConnector.HelpText: List of the reversals belonging to a specific transfer.

RestConnector.Title: List Orders
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns a list of your orders.

RestConnector.Title: Returns
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns a list of your order returns.

RestConnector.Title: SKUs
RestConnector.HelpText: Returns a list of your SKUs.
